## Feature Request Process
Thank you for suggesting a feature! Our process:
1. Feature requests are reviewed by the maintainers
2. High-priority features may be broken down into epics with sub-tasks
3. Implementation timeline depends on priority and team capacity
4. We'll provide updates on the status of your request
